summary: This is an FBI FD-302 interview summary from April 10, 2020, with an unnamed female victim. She alleges she was manipulated, sexually abused, and threatened by Leon Black, who she claims ran a sex trafficking ring, forced her to meet Jeffrey Epstein, and connected her to other high-profile figures. The document details allegations of rape, coercion, and financial transactions between Black and Epstein.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: Allegedly manipulated, sexually abused, and threatened the interviewee; claimed to run a sex trafficking ring and forced her to meet Jeffrey Epstein; allegedly transferred $10 million to Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The interviewee was taken to his Florida home; his assistants pressured her to have sex with him, citing his 'sex addiction'; received a financial transfer from Leon Black.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The interviewee was introduced to her by Leon Black.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: The interviewee was introduced to him by Leon Black.

persons.name: Harvey Weinstein
persons.context: Leon Black told the interviewee he was friends with him.

connections.description: Black allegedly transferred ten million dollars to Epstein around 2015 and took the victim to Epstein's home.
Black introduced the victim to Ghislaine Maxwell.
Black introduced the victim to Prince Andrew.
Black told the victim he was friends with Harvey Weinstein.
The victim alleges Black was part of a sex trafficking ring and facilitated her being pressured to have sex with Epstein.
Black allegedly manipulated, sexually abused, threatened, and raped the victim, using promises and coercion to control her.
Epstein's assistants pressured the victim to have sex with him under threats, though she refused.

events.title: Victim meets Leon Black
events.description: The victim, while modeling, met Leon Black who promised her drugs.

events.title: Alleged rape by Leon Black
events.description: Leon Black allegedly forced his way into the victim's apartment and raped her.

events.title: Signing of Non-Disclosure Agreement
events.description: The victim signed a non-disclosure agreement with Leon Black.

events.title: $10 Million Transfer to Epstein
events.description: Leon Black transferred ten million dollars to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: FBI Interview of Victim
events.description: The unnamed victim was interviewed telephonically by the FBI regarding her allegations against Leon Black and Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: New York, New York, United States
keyFacts: An unnamed victim alleges Leon Black manipulated, sexually abused, threatened, and raped her over several years, claiming he ran a sex trafficking ring.
The victim was taken to Jeffrey Epstein's Florida home where Epstein's assistants pressured her to have sex with Epstein, citing his 'sex addiction' and making threats.
Leon Black allegedly transferred ten million dollars to Jeffrey Epstein around 2015.
The victim was introduced by Black to high-profile figures including Ghislaine Maxwell and Prince Andrew.
The victim signed a non-disclosure agreement with Leon Black in the fall of 2015.
